text:
September 28, 1962
Mrs, Betty MeKms&e
national Association of Educational Broadcasters
119 Gregory Flail
BTbana, Illinois
Boar Betty i
Thank yon for your letter of September 19#
I would like to show the covers at our PR
Committee meeting and also at the convention as
part of my report# Would that be agreeable with
you?
I should think you could charge $1*00 for the
KITS without straining anyone unduly# Twenty-five
cents Is certainly reasonable enough#
See you soon##*
Sincerely,
Marion Cornell, Manager
Educational Television
P.S. What should we discuss at our meeting?
MCida
